name: uva-hoohacks-2024-project
description: By: Joshua Almonte, Frank Hyun, Kareem Fenaish, Ayan Rasulova Our entry for the 2024 HooHacks competition

scripts.dev: start "Django Server" backend\env\Scripts\python.exe backend\myproject\manage.py runserver & start "Vite Server" cmd /c "cd .\backend\myproject && npm run frontend && vite --port=5173"
